HERO.SUBTITLE: I transform complex ideas into powerful and intelligent web applications. Specialized in Angular, Spring Boot, and AI integration.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.P1: A passionate developer with a strong background in software engineering and a love for creating efficient, scalable web solutions. My goal is to turn a vision into technical reality, with a special focus on code quality and user experience.
ABOUT.P2: From robust backend development with Spring Boot to creating dynamic user interfaces with Angular, I master the entire development lifecycle. My DevOps skills enable me to ensure smooth deployment and efficient continuous integration.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Technical Skills
SKILLS.SUBTITLE: Click on a skill to discover my expertise and how I apply it in my projects.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Angular
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I design robust and maintainable Single Page Applications (SPAs). Mastery of components, services, routing, state management with RxJS, and performance optimization for a smooth user experience.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Spring Boot
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I develop secure and high-performance RESTful APIs with Spring Boot. I have solid experience with Spring Data JPA for persistence, Spring Security for authentication (JWT), and dependency management.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Docker
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I containerize applications (frontend and backend) to ensure a consistent and isolated deployment environment. I create optimized Dockerfiles for lightweight and secure images, and orchestrate containers with Docker Compose.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Java
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: My primary language for backend development. Mastery of OOP, data structures, lambdas, and streams (Java 8+). I use it within the Spring ecosystem to build complex business logic.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: PostgreSQL
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Designing relational database schemas, writing complex SQL queries, and optimizing performance. I use PostgreSQL as a reliable storage solution for my Spring Boot applications.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: AWS
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Deploying and managing applications on key AWS services like EC2 (virtual servers), S3 (object storage), and RDS (managed databases). Understanding of Infrastructure as Code (IaC).

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Recent Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: A selection of projects that showcase my technical expertise and problem-solving abilities.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: E-commerce Platform "SmartShop"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A complete e-commerce application with user management, product catalog, cart, and secure Stripe payment integration. The architecture is based on microservices and a robust RESTful API.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: Monitoring Dashboard "InfraView"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A real-time dashboard for monitoring server status. Data is pushed from the backend to the client via WebSockets for minimal latency. The entire system is containerized with Docker and deployed on AWS.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: FinTech Application "Financika"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A personal budget management platform allowing users to track their expenses, create budgets, and visualize their financial habits through interactive charts (Chart.js).

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: Booking System "VitaTrack"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A web application for booking appointments at health centers. It features an interactive calendar, practitioner availability management, and email notification sending.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: E-learning Platform "LearnSphere"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: An online learning solution where instructors can upload video courses (stored on S3) and students can enroll and track their progress. The project includes admin, instructor, and student roles.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Discuss Your Project
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: I am passionate about creating innovative solutions and am always open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or a concrete proposal, feel free to reach out.
